TopicTitle: Gilly: The place of no Gravity.

Articles.Content:
Gilly: the place where you can have a 1337 epic fight, punch the other guy. And send him 96.4 KM away.

Oh and you aswell (N's 3rd law).

Gilly, the place you can deorbit with whack-a-kerbal.

Gilly, the place turbo pumped went to with a 2.9 ton rocket.
Gilly, the 8.07783 mile wide space potato. (Dino killer asteroid is estimated to be 6 miles wide.)
Gilly: A silly place.

Gilly: the place you can run and jump yo orbit on. 

Gilly: the place that a 1000 ton rocket can be head butted into orbit.

Gilly: the hilarious place.
Gilly: Still more interesting than Dres.
Gilly, the place that solar panel deployment can put you sub orbital.

Gilly, the place that has more gravity than hale from OPM. You can put a 20,000 mothership (if you can make one that heavy) with the thrust of 1 aerospike on escape trajectory in about 5 seconds.

Edited April 17, 2016 by max_creative
Badd speling
Gilly: the asteroid that wants to be bigger.
Gilly: A moon who's size represents it's actual value.

Gilly: You can make fun of it now, but it will get revenge.

Gilly: It's biding its time.

Gilly: You won't think it's small and funny when it's on an impact trajectory with the KSC. No, you won't be mocking it's lack of gravity then. And then, only Gilly will laugh.

Gilly: Knows it can only make empty threats cuz its trapped in Eve's SOI forever.

Edited April 11, 2016 by EliasDanger
Gilly: Ant engines are overkill, Mammoth engines are an instant Gilly to Eve trajectory.

On April 11, 2016 at 11:37 PM, EliasDanger said:

Gilly: You won't think it's small and funny when it's on an impact trajectory with the KSC. No, you won't be mocking it's lack of gravity then. And then, only Gilly will laugh.

Go watch this.
Gilly: It's a Dresteroid in the wrong spot.

Gilly: the place that you make fun of gravity on. 

Gilly: the place someone flew an ion X-Wing on. 

BTW isn't that a little mean to both dresteriods and Gilly? A little...

Gilly: When your colony suffers an overpopulation crisis.

 

Gilly: 10-person hive world.

 

Gilly: Playing soccer with the lander that got you there.

 

Gilly: Jump-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying-flying...flying............flying.....................................................flying.......................................................................................................................................................................................falling................................................falling..............................................falling.....falling...falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-falling-SMACK

Edited April 18, 2016 by Matuchkin
Gilly, the place where , if you are really efficient, you can go to the surface and back with an EVA jetpack.
Gilly: the land of toilets with seat belts.
Gilly: Where you can jump your way into orbit.

Gilly: when ion transportation across the surface ACTUALLY EXISTS HOLY FRICK

that scenario always inspired me
Gilly. The place where the psychodelic purple thing in the sky makes you fly.
Gilly: the place you go to relax after your terrifying Eve landing.
Gilly: the space was never so close.
Gilly: the moon where you want to be going fast less than a KM up
Gilly: the best boi
